issue.title: [C++]  Fix build error of memory-benchmark
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5567](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5567). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
'memory-benchmark.cc' is implemented by x86 AVX and SSE instructions.
Build would failed on Arm64 when DARROW_BUILD_BENCHMARKS is enabled.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5567?focusedCommentId=16866130) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4528
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4528>
